biotools.summary: Tool for validating novel Single Nucleotide Variants (SNVs). It utilizes the details in the alignment files in order to identify the reproducible genotypes, hence distinguishing the true variants from artifacts. It can also be used to compare the nucleotide signals in different BAM files.

bioschemas.name: pibase
